tool.name: Metastats
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='metastats' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' #if $as_datasets.__str__ == "yes": --datasetid='$logfile.id' --new_file_path='$__new_file_path__' --new_datasets='^\S+?\.((unique|[0-9.]*)(\..*?)+\.metastats)$:txt' #end if --shared="$otu" --design="$design" #if $label.__str__ != "None" and len($label.__str__) > 0: --label='$label' #end if #if $groups.__str__ != "None" and len($groups.__str__) > 0: --groups='$groups' #end if #if int($iters.__str__) > 0: --iters="$iters" #end if #if 1 >= $threshold >= 0: --threshold="$threshold" #end if #if $sets.__str__ != "None" and len($sets.__str__) > 0: --sets="$sets" #end if --processors=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-8}

param.name: design
param.label: design - assign groups to new grouping
param.help: design has 2 columns: group(col 1) and grouping(col 2) (separated by a TAB character) use make.design

param.name: threshold
param.label: threshold - significance level to reject null hypotheses (ignored if < 0)

param.name: as_datasets
param.label: Create a new history datasets for each label

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The metastats_ command generate principle components plot data.
.. _metastats: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Metastats
v.1.21.0: Updated to mothur 1.33
